name: Word Cascade (itch)
description:
Prototype for a simple puzzle game where the goal is to build chains with the words that are falling in cascade.

Thanks for playing! Any feedback is appreciated.

-- Current version: May 25th 2022. v0.1 --
First version.

Instructions

1.- Create chains placing words in the available squares.

2.- Chains are created by matching the last character in a word with the first character of the next one. For example: adress - salad

3.- Unused words go to the discard pile. When the pile is full the game is over! However, when 3 words of the same color land in the pile sequentially, they are recycled in a match-3 fashion :)

4.- Click the black bordered square to place the falling word in it. Click the green button to set the word free.

Future ideas

1.- Add a way for the player to control de words speed

2.- Add ways for the player to control in which direction the released word will travel
